name: Run, lil Hedgehog ,Run
description:
In "Run, lil Hedgehog, Run !" you play as a funny lil hedgehog and have to collect the acorns so you can survive the winter, while running away from the hungry foxes.

Controls: 

-W: up

-S: down

-D: right

-A:left

This is the first game I ever made , so all feedback is welcome.
